verses.roman:
śuni mahāprabhu kahe aiche mat kaha
āmā prati bhaṭṭācāryera haya anugraha

synonyms: śuni—hearing them; mahāprabhu—Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahe—says; aiche—such; mat kaha—do not speak; āmā prati—toward Me; bhaṭṭācāryera—of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; haya—there is; anugraha—mercy.
translation: Hearing this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "Do not speak like that. Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya has shown great affection and mercy toward Me.
